name: Final Frontier (itch)
description:
CGAJam game. A western RPGish where you must take down the terrible bandits that have infested Blind Bullet Bill's Ranch. Destroy the four bandit encampments and get back the four pages of Bills land deed.

Use wasd or arrow keys to move, mouse to aim click and shoot, and the escape button to bring up the menu.

Note the options button does nothing, I just never took it out.

Music was made by Ulalume.

Game made using the Godot Engine.
